version_description:
Headsprout has arrived to the Kids A-Z app! Students who have access to Headsprout can now work on their interactive episodes right from the app.

Headsprout is the smartest kids' reading program on the market today. The program uses effective, inte
Bug fixes and other minor enhancements.
Bug fixes and enhancements.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements, including improved support for iOS 10.
Bug fixes and enhancements.

Teachers can now log into the Kids A-Z app for quick view of their class roster. View and edit student passwords or award stars right from the app!

There have also been numerous bug fixes and minor enhancements.
Assorted bug fixes and minor enhancements, including the option to adjust student reading levels right from the new Teacher Mode.
Quick bug fixes.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements to both the Reading and Headsprout planets.
Quick bug fixes.
Running record tool is available for teachers. This version also includes minor enhancements and bug fixes.
Assorted enhancements to the Running Record tool available after logging in as a teacher.
Minor bug fixes and enhancements.
Support for assignments created on Raz-Plus, which allow collections of books to be assigned to whole class, small groups, or individual students.
Student management enhancements, allowing teachers the ability to log in and manage their classroom rosters. They can add students, arrange reading groups, and more!
Minor bug fixes and enhancements.

Teachers can now log in and see which students in their classrooms have logged into Kids A-Z in the past hour! Reading groups are also now fully supported in the Teacher view. This release also includes bug fixes and other minor enhancements.
Better support for iOS 11.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements.
Bug fixes and enhancements.
Minor enhancements.
Students can now view their progress in the new "Stats" area! We are also continuing to make bug fixes and other minor enhancements.
Minor bug fixes and enhancements.

4.0.0: Announcing the release of two exciting new features! The brand new Avatar Builder allows students to make personalized superheros, athletes, robots and more. And with our latest incentives program, Badges, students will love collecting badges as th
Raz-Plus and Raz-Kids students can now tag books as favorites! Also, messages from their teacher will now arrive as a push notification on a student's device (in "personal mode" only).

We’ve updated the design of our student login page in anticipation of the upcoming mobile version of “Intermediate” user interface. This release also includes numerous small bug fixes and minor enhancements.
Fix a crash.

In addition to the current space-themed primary student portal, older students can now access the customizable intermediate portal. Students in grade 3+ see the intermediate portal by default. We’ve also updated the Reading Room to include books by Topic,
Minor bug fixes
Fixed an issue with Headsprout assignments.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements.

This release includes support for interactive worksheets, such as ELL Content Picture Packs and Argumentation Skill Packs, which are designed to effectively and efficiently help students develop vocabulary, language, and critical thinking skills!
Bug fixes and assorted minor enhancements, including custom background purchasing for the new intermediate interface.
Teachers now have the ability to send messages to their students, along with other bug fixes and minor enhancements.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements
Bug fixes and minor enhancements
Bug fixes and minor enhancements

This release includes support for interactive worksheets, such as ELL Content Picture Packs and Argumentation Skill Packs, which are designed to effectively and efficiently help students develop vocabulary, language, and critical thinking skills!
Bug fixes and minor enhancements.
Fixed a bug where students couldn't complete a read activity on iOS 9.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements.
This release includes teacher mode support for changing a student's interface, incentives, and parent access.

Parents can now log in to the Kids A-Z app to view their children's progress! Log in from the teacher class chart page using your parent credentials.
This release also includes teacher mode support for changing a student's science assignment.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements.
Fixed a crash some users may be experiencing on launch.

The new Vocabulary A-Z includes pre-made word lists and games that connect classroom instruction, practice, and assessment to help students build vocabulary and increase reading comprehension. This release also includes improvements to accessibility and v

The Kids A-Z app now supports multi-classrooms for teachers where they can assign students to specific classrooms. Headsprout Reading Comprehension supports benchmarks at every tenth episode.
This release also includes many improvements to accessibili
This release includes some interface enhancements along with additional accessibility improvements and minor bug fixes.
This release includes some interface enhancements along with additional accessibility improvements and minor bug fixes.
Crash fixes.
Crash fixes.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements.
Fixed an issue with Headsprout assignments.
This release includes notification improvements and various bug fixes.
Bug fixes in Headsprout sessions.
User interface updates and bug fixes.
This release includes notification improvements and various bug fixes.
Fixing some Headsprout freezing problems.
Improvements to Headsprout and other features.
Fixed some additional Headsprout bugs.
This release includes various improvements and bug fixes.
Fixes crash relating to the reading room with classroom mode off

New students can now go through our Reading Level Placement Tool and be automatically placed at a starting independent reading level. Also in this release is a completely redesigned look for the book lists and offline support for quizzes.

5.18.0: This release includes support for multiple vocabulary assignment types, like Phonics, Spelling, and Vocabulary.
This release also includes support for dark mode in parent and teacher mode, various bug fixes, and improvements.
This release includes various crash fixes, bug fixes, and improvements.
This release includes our redesigned star reward page - complete any activity to check it out! We’re also now supporting the new sequenced Vocabulary A-Z assignment types.
This release includes support for "intervention" assignments, as well as various enhancements and bug fixes.

5.22.0: We’ve partnered with UNICEF Kid Power! Starting September 8th, students can donate stars to help feed families in need.
This release also includes minor enhancements and bug fixes

We’ve added support for Vocabulary A-Z games to be assigned alongside our Raz-Plus or Raz-Kids books, and our Science A-Z Instructional Units!   This release also includes minor enhancements and bug fixes.
5.24.0: This release includes assorted bug fixes, assignment enhancements, and a new look for our book quizzes!
Fixes a number of recently found bugs.
In addition to previous bug fixes and feature updates version 5.24.3 fixes an issue with Science Library access.
This release includes minor enhancements and bug fixes.
Fixes vocabulary assignment navigation in the "My Assignment" activity
Various bug fixes and improvments.
